ProjectTitle: Endoplasmic reticulum and mitochondria: common drivers of human Î² cell and neuronal fate
InitialFeedbackHistory: 04/01/2023 [REDACTED] DMP contains a lot of generic information, please remove the information that is not relevant for this specific project. [REDACTED] note that FWO asks for EOS projects to include all data for the entire project in the DMP so it can be used as guide/checklist for the different partners to handle, find understand and reuse the datasets: see www.fwo.be/en/the-fwo/research-policy/data-management-plan "the DMP should cover the entire EOS project, not only the [REDACTED] part.....". Please make sure to add this in your final DMP to be submitted as part of the final report via the e-portal of the spokesperson-coordinator at the end of your project. [REDACTED] ethics approvals you give are rather old, ecd approvals are valid for max 5 years which means your approval from 2018 will expire soon, please ensure you have valid ethical approvals throughout the project. Please submit an updated DMP as intermediate. [REDACTED] can find more guidance about the different DMP sections on our RDM website: www.kuleuven.be/rdm/en/guidance
label: good with suggestions
